## Routines

```{python}
import pandas as pd

workouts = "../../static/resources/workouts.xlsx"
w1 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=0)
w2 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=1)
w3 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=2)
w4 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=3)
schedule = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=4)
```

The following regimen outlines a 4 week lift cycle. The routine is a slightly modified version of [this](https://jackedgorilla.com/chris-pratt-workout-routine/). Non-lift days should be supplemented with active recovery workouts.

### Schedule

```{python}
schedule.to_html(index=False, render_links=True)
```
